sys_ux_client_script.name: Toggle Comment Reaction

sys_update_version.name: sys_ux_client_script_cde81fb945c64210e2e6d334c958d7ae
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><controller_preset/><includes/><macroponent display_value="Article page">c9e81fb943c6421009ecb955c03ccdb8</macroponent><name>Toggle Comment Reaction</name><preset/><required_translations>[ ]</required_translations><script><![CDATA[function handler({ api, event, imports }) {
  var likeCommentPayload = {
    operation: {
      dataElementId: "like_knowledge_comment",
      operationName: "EXECUTE"
    },
    operationPayload: {
      commentId: event.payload.commentId,
      articleId: api.context.props.sysId
    }
  }

  var unlikeCommentPayload = {
    operation: {
      dataElementId: "unlike_knowledge_comment",
      operationName: "EXECUTE"
    },
    operationPayload: {
      commentId: event.payload.commentId,
      articleId: api.context.props.sysId
    }
  }

  if (event.payload.reaction) {
    api.emit("UXF_DB_OP_TRIGGER_REQUESTED", likeCommentPayload);
  } else {
    api.emit("UXF_DB_OP_TRIGGER_REQUESTED", unlikeCommentPayload);
  }
}
]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>system</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-05-09 16:50:16</sys_created_on><sys_id>cde81fb945c64210e2e6d334c958d7ae</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Toggle Comment Reaction</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Raposa Aí Reviews" source="x_1300284_raposa_0">d611c33d4746421025e7b4b4116d439c</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Raposa Aí Reviews">d611c33d4746421025e7b4b4116d439c</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_cde81fb945c64210e2e6d334c958d7ae</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>system</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-05-09 16:50:16</sys_updated_on><target/><type/></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>
